title: Lynda - Advertising on Twitter
description:

This Course will be good to the Best for DL within 30 days after has been post, after that it might not be good DL already, please do me favour to continue seeding to keep this torrent alive.

1h 41m Beginner Dec 14, 2015  | Uploaded in Dec 24, 2015 by 2boweb

Subject: Marketing 
Software: Twitter 
Author: Megan Adams 

Engagement on every social platform is moving toward a pay-to-play model. So why choose Twitter? Twitter's paid advertising features can help grow your business and build brand awareness in real timeâ€”helping you target audiences by demographic, keyword, username, or interest.â€¨â€¨This course shows businesses of all sizes how to use Twitter advertising to engage followers and customers. It starts with an explanation of Twitter ad types and targeting options. Social media strategist Megan Adams then shows how to craft a powerful profile, set up an advertising account, and create your first ad campaign. To show Twitter ads in action, she creates campaigns around seven specific goals: gaining followers, driving traffic to a webpage, collecting leads, promoting an app, and more.â€¨â€¨Along the way, you'll find out how set up bids and budgets, manage hidden and scheduled tweets, review campaign reports, write great ads, and attach photos and video with Twitter Cards.
Topics include:
	â€¢	Twitter ad types and Twitter Card types
	â€¢	Creating a Twitter profile
	â€¢	Targeting an audience
	â€¢	Setting up bidding
	â€¢	Creating a campaign
	â€¢	Creating promoted tweets
	â€¢	Scheduling tweets
	â€¢	Including photos and video in tweets
	â€¢	Viewing reports
